name: Tragedy Theater
description:
Introduction
Tragedy Theater is RPGmaker Horror game.
You'll get the thrill of being chased by those mascots. Don't get caught.
Help your friend, result puzzles and choose the choice that won't make our boy out of his mind.

More than 15 animations when die.
And 5 ending.



Story
you are a boy who had invited by your friends to abandoned mansion for hunting ghost challenge.
The boy had another reason to decide to agree like his friends.
The abandoned mansion is part of the theme park that had use to popular.
Because of the mascots that children love.
But the reason it was abandoned may have something relate to the disappearances that happen often nowadays.



They will can escape from there or not, it up to you who have to play this game self.

"What should customers know about the Mature Content in this game?".
Content in this game is extreme violence, such as dead or blood.
